name: KillJoy
description:
KillJoy (Cayfolom)
Settting: futurism
Art style: shadow (as in vector)
The Time Epoch: The Future of Time
Genre: 2d shooter
Chip: generated content.

Do you remember what Pray 2 should be when it was just announced?
That's right - the game about the bounty hunter: clapping:
Actually a project about a mercenary who helps order protectors in putting things in order,
cleaning out the criminal rot from the most provincial corners of Dirty City wink ::
: cool:

Control
Control fully on the mouse
Hold the left button - shoot
Click right - jump
The average on the ground puts a teleport, in the air moves to him the player.
